content:
FYI, I just opened an issue to propose adding WASIp3 support to the Go compiler and runtime. Feel free to chime in if you have thoughts or opinions.

proposal: all: add wasip3/wasm port 路 Issue #77141 路 golang/go
Proposal Details This proposes to add support for WASIp3, the next milestone of the WebAssembly System Interface (WASI), which is expected to be released in early 2026. Background and Motivation As...
